title: Đề thi cuối HK1 - Tiếng Anh 8 Global Success
description: Ôn tập đề thi cuối học kì 1 Tiếng Anh 8 - Global Success với giải thích chi tiết
grammarTopics: Quantifiers (A few, a little, many, much)

theory.brief: Đề thi HK1 Tiếng Anh 8 bao gồm các dạng bài: Nghe hiểu (TRUE/FALSE, điền từ), Đọc hiểu, Ngữ pháp, Viết lại câu, và Viết câu từ gợi ý.
examples: If it rains, we will stay at home. (Câu điều kiện loại 1)
Unless you hurry, you will be late. = If you don't hurry, you will be late.
This book is more interesting than that one. (So sánh hơn)

exercises.title: Listening - TRUE or FALSE
exercises.instruction: Nghe đoạn audio và xác định các câu sau đúng (TRUE) hay sai (FALSE)

questions.statement: Minh feels stressed because his parents force him to study subjects that he is completely bad at.
questions.explanation: Minh cảm thấy căng thẳng vì bố mẹ ép học các môn anh ấy hoàn toàn kém - câu này sai vì trong audio, Minh chỉ căng thẳng về áp lực học tập, không phải vì bị ép học các môn kém.

questions.statement: Minh's parents expect him to achieve good results in both academic subjects and extracurricular activities.
questions.explanation: Bố mẹ Minh kỳ vọng anh ấy đạt kết quả tốt ở cả các môn học và hoạt động ngoại khóa - đây là áp lực chính mà Minh gặp phải.

questions.statement: Ann stopped attending all extra classes after her parents talked to her about their interests.
questions.explanation: Ann ngừng tham gia tất cả các lớp học thêm sau khi bố mẹ nói chuyện về sở thích - câu này sai, Ann không ngừng hẳn mà chỉ giảm bớt.

questions.statement: Ann is satisfied with her body shape and no longer worries about her weight.
questions.explanation: Ann hài lòng với vóc dáng và không còn lo lắng về cân nặng - đúng, Ann đã chấp nhận bản thân.

hints: Lắng nghe kỹ về nguyên nhân stress của Minh
Chú ý từ 'all', 'completely' - từ tuyệt đối

exercises.title: Listening - Fill in the blanks
exercises.instruction: Nghe và điền từ còn thiếu vào chỗ trống
exercises.passage:
Ethnic (1)_______ children might live life different from that of most Kinh children. They spend some of their time helping their parents inside and outside the house. They learn to work from an early age, usually at six. Girls help look after the house, care for smaller children, weave clothing, and prepare food. Boys learn to do what their fathers do. They grow (2)_______, raise the family's livestock, and catch fish.

In the evening, the family often gathers round the open fire. Children listen to stories or (3)_______ of heroes from their grandparents. They also listen to adults talk about their work. This is how the elders pass on traditions and (4)_______ to their children.

Nowadays, more and more minority children are going to school. There, they meet children from other ethnic groups. They play new games and learn new things.

acceptedAnswers: minority
questions.hint: Trẻ em dân tộc thiểu số

acceptedAnswers: crops
legends
knowledge

hints: Từ (1) liên quan đến ethnic group
Từ (2) là thứ người ta trồng trọt

exercises.title: Reading - Fill in the blanks
passage:
Ethnic Markets
16 – 25 January
Exhibition of specialities of many ethnic groups featuring vegetables, flowers, crafts, and more. At the ethnic markets, visitors can see and buy (1)______ local products from different ethnic groups. Fresh vegetables, colourful flowers, and handmade crafts are beautifully displayed.

Photo Exhibition
16 – 25 January
The photo exhibition presents many vivid images of ethnic people in their villages. Through these pictures, visitors can learn more about the simple but (2)_______ life of ethnic communities.

Performances
17 and 24 January
The performances include more than 20 traditional songs and dances from different ethnic groups. Skilled (3)_______ wear traditional costumes and use ethnic musical instruments.

Childhood Fun
17 – 18 and 24 – 25 January
This activity offers a great day out for the whole family. Children can enjoy traditional folk games and create simple handicrafts under (4)______ guidance of local artisans.

questions.question: Blank (1): visitors can see and buy ______ local products
questions.explanation: 'A wide range of' là cụm từ cố định nghĩa là 'nhiều loại, đa dạng'. 'Wide' là tính từ, không dùng trạng từ 'widely'.

questions.question: Blank (2): the simple but _______ life
questions.explanation: Cần tính từ (adjective) để bổ nghĩa cho danh từ 'life'. 'Meaningful' = có ý nghĩa.

questions.question: Blank (3): Skilled _______ wear traditional costumes
questions.explanation: Cần danh từ số nhiều vì 'wear' không có 's' (động từ số nhiều). 'Performers' = những người biểu diễn.

questions.question: Blank (4): under ______ guidance of local artisans
questions.explanation: 'Under the guidance of' là cụm từ cố định. Dùng 'the' vì 'guidance' được xác định.

hints: Chú ý cụm từ cố định
Xác định từ loại cần điền

exercises.title: Reading Comprehension - A Traditional Festival
passage: I come from a quiet village in northern Viet Nam. Every year, the villagers eagerly wait for a special festival that takes place after Tet. It is a meaningful event that everyone, from children to the elderly, enjoys.

Early in the morning, people gather along the riverside to take part in exciting activities. One of the most popular events is the rice-cooking contest. Teams must light a fire, cook rice, and complete the task as quickly as possible. Another interesting game is tug of war, where villagers cheer loudly to support their teams.

Around midday, the elders are invited to the communal house for a traditional meal. At the same time, families return home to prepare their own feasts. We usually make familiar dishes such as banh chung, boiled chicken, and spring rolls.
The festival is a precious occasion for our village. It allows us to preserve our cultural values, bring people closer together, and create unforgettable memories with our families.

questions.question: Why do the villagers eagerly wait for the festival every year?
options: Because it is held during Tet
Because it is a meaningful event enjoyed by people of all ages
Because it only happens once in a lifetime
questions.explanation: Đoạn 1: 'It is a meaningful event that everyone, from children to the elderly, enjoys.'

questions.question: Which factor determines the winner of the rice-cooking contest?
options: The strength of the team members
The design of the cooking tools
Both speed and the quality of cooked rice
The number of people in each team
questions.explanation: Bài nói 'complete the task as quickly as possible' - nhanh nhất + chất lượng cơm.

questions.question: What can be inferred from villagers cheering loudly during the tug of war?
options: The game is difficult to understand
The event encourages unity and collective participation
questions.explanation: Cổ vũ nhiệt tình → thể hiện tinh thần đoàn kết và tham gia tập thể.

questions.question: Which statement best summarizes the overall message of the passage?
options: Village festivals mainly focus on competitions
Traditional festivals play an important role in preserving culture and strengthening social bonds
Modern life has reduced the value of festivals
questions.explanation: Đoạn cuối: 'preserve our cultural values, bring people closer together'.

hints: Đọc kỹ đoạn cuối để tìm ý chính

exercises.question: People should protect traditional customs; _______, many cultural values may be lost.
exercises.explanation: 'Otherwise' = nếu không thì (chỉ hậu quả tiêu cực). Nếu không bảo vệ → sẽ mất.
hints: Chú ý nghĩa của liên từ

exercises.question: We stayed in _______ hotel near the river during the festival.
exercises.explanation: 'A hotel' - danh từ đếm được số ít, chưa xác định. 'Hotel' phát âm /həʊˈtel/ → dùng 'a'.
hints: Mạo từ a/an dựa vào âm đầu

exercises.question: He usually goes _______ the buffaloes with other boys in his village.
exercises.explanation: 'Go + V-ing' cho hoạt động thường xuyên: go swimming, go fishing, go herding (đi chăn trâu).

exercises.title: Reading - Fill in the blanks (Alaska)
passage: Alaska, the largest state in the United States, offers a unique way of life that many visitors find fascinating. Despite its vast area of nearly 1.7 million square kilometres, Alaska has a relatively small (1)_________.

(2)_________ native communities in Alaska continue to preserve their cultural heritage. Traditional skills such as fishing, hunting, and (3)_________ handmade tools are still practised today. Each ethnic group has its own customs, stories, and celebrations, which are passed down through generations. Tourists can learn about (4)_________ traditions by visiting local villages, cultural centres, and historical exhibitions.

questions.question: Blank (1): Alaska has a relatively small _________
questions.explanation: 'Population' = dân số (danh từ không đếm được). 'Small population' = dân số ít.

questions.question: Blank (2): _________ native communities in Alaska
questions.explanation: 'Many' + danh từ đếm được số nhiều. 'Communities' là số nhiều → Many.

questions.question: Blank (3): fishing, hunting, and _________ handmade tools
questions.explanation: Cấu trúc song song: fishing, hunting, and making (đều là V-ing).

questions.question: Blank (4): learn about _________ traditions
questions.explanation: 'These' + danh từ số nhiều. 'Traditions' là số nhiều → These (chỉ về các truyền thống đã đề cập ở câu trước).

hints: Xác định từ loại cần điền
Chú ý cấu trúc song song

exercises.title: Reading Comprehension - Alaska
passage: If you go to the American state of Alaska, you might find the traditional lifestyle there interesting. Although Alaska is quite large, with nearly 1.7 million square kilometres, it has a small population of about 730,000.

The native peoples in Alaska still maintain many of their traditions. They keep their old ways of making arts and crafts alive. Various native groups have their own special styles of carving or weaving as well as their unique tribal dances and drumming.

Alaska is also known for its unusual method of transport - the dogsled. Today, dog sledding (= mushing) is more of a sport than a true means of transport. The best-known race is the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race, a 1,510 km race from Anchorage to Nome.

questions.question: What does the word 'there' in the first sentence refer to?
questions.explanation: 'There' trong câu đầu chỉ nơi chốn vừa nhắc đến = 'the American state of Alaska'.

questions.question: The phrase 'keep their old ways alive' is closest in meaning to:
options: Change their traditions to suit modern life
questions.explanation: 'Keep their old ways alive' = giữ cho cách làm cũ còn sống = tiếp tục thực hành.

questions.question: Which activity is NOT mentioned as part of Alaska Native traditions?
questions.explanation: Dog sledding được nói là 'more of a sport' (thể thao) → KHÔNG phải truyền thống.

questions.question: According to the passage, what is the main purpose of the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race?
options: It is mainly a sporting event today
It is the main method of transport in Alaska
It connects Anchorage to Nome for daily travel
questions.explanation: Bài viết nói 'dog sledding is more of a sport than a true means of transport' → chủ yếu là thể thao.

hints: Chú ý đại từ 'there' chỉ gì
Phân biệt tradition và sport
